quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
author: John A. Shedd

quote: If you don't take risks, you'll have a wasted soul.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Happiness is a risk. If you’re not a little scared, then you’re not doing it right.
author: Sarah Addison Allen

quote: Never was anything great achieved without danger.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Risk anything! Care no more for the opinion of others ... Do the hardest thing on earth for you. Act for yourself. Face the truth."
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
author: Criss Jami

quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road…Unless you fail to make the turn.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Fortune sides with him who dares.
author: Virgil

quote: The question, love, is whether you want me enough to take the risk.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: Love is not something you protect. It’s something you risk.
author: Gayle Forman

quote: There is no discovery without risk and what you risk reveals what you value.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: The practice of love offers no place of safety. We risk loss, hurt, pain. We risk being acted upon by forces outside our control.
author: Bell Hooks

quote: But if you're gonna dine with them cannibals
author: Nick Cave

quote: Risk means 'shit happens' or 'good luck
author: Toba Beta

quote: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Vital lives are about action. You can't feel warmth unless you create it, can't feel delight until you play, can't know serendipity unless you risk.
author: Joan Erickson

quote: If you are afraid to take a chance, take one anyway. What you don't do can create the same regrets as the mistakes you make.
author: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: To save all we must risk all.
author: Friedrich von Schiller

quote: Love is a violent recreational sport. Proceed at your own risk. Helmets, armor, and steel-toe boots are required by law.
author: H.C. Paye

quote: To win without risk is to triumph without glory.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: The desire for safety stands against every great and noble enterprise.
author: Tacitus

quote: You're never perfectly safe. No human being on Earth ever is or ever was. To live is to risk your life, your heart, everything.
author: Rick Yancey

quote: Not learning by doing,
author: Toba Beta

quote: You won't be a wiser man if you always
author: Toba Beta

quote: If you play it safe in life, you've decided that you don't want to grow anymore.
author: Shirley Hufstedler

quote: Hypocrite shouts about the change,
author: Toba Beta

quote: You must go further than I did," Nedra said. "You know that."
author: James Salter

quote: He reached out and intertwined our hands. Gently urging me forward he whispered, “Have I lost you love?
author: Erin Jamison

quote: To take that risk, to offer life and remain alive, open yourself like this and become whole.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Wisdom mitigates the risk of being honest.
author: Toba Beta

quote: The choice to avoid risk is the choice to avoid living, and to avoid living is one of the greatest risk of all.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: I'm starting to think that my level of intrigue outweighs my fear of controversy.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The greatest risk to man is not that he aims too high and misses, but that he aims too low and hits.
author: Michaelangelo

quote: Being safe doesn't mean you won't be sorry.
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

quote: If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: Burning bridges behind you is understandable. It's the bridges before us that we burn, not realizing we may need to cross, that brings regret.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: It is part of a good man to do great and noble deeds, though he risk everything.
author: Plutarch

quote: After awhile you realize that putting your actions where your mouth is makes you less likely to have to put your money where your mouth is.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Overconfidence blurs out the risk. Inferiority magnifies it.
author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

quote: All life's a risk, that's what makes it interesting.
author: Megan Chance

quote: One cannot bring up boys to be eagles and then expect them to be sparrows.
author: Edith Kermit Carow Roosevelt

quote: All choices are fraught with peril, but inaction is the most perilous of all.
author: Frewin Jones

quote: You jeopardize all if move slowly on a fast lane.
author: Toba Beta

quote: People who live life in fear of taking risks die without living it.
author: Fola

quote: I’ll not let the pair of you charge boldly into wolves’ teeth without me alongside
author: Meredith Ann Pierce

quote: She'd risked everything, and here was the result: the raw, warped core of her life.
author: Jennifer Egan

quote: There's sometimes a tugging feeling you get to push further when you aren't being challenged enough or when things get too comfortable.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Smartass Disciple: Why men don't ready yet to join the intergalactic confederation?
author: Toba Beta

quote: Despite her fears she found,
author: Kyra Jackson

quote: Some concepts are so incredibly risky they take an honest fool to try to articulate them.
author: Criss Jami

quote: It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Chirp of coward shouted in crowd,
author: Toba Beta

quote: If you risk nothing, then you risk everything.
author: Geena Davis

quote: and I said, 'That is why you don't climb mountains, Gwen.' But now I wonder. You aren't afraid of heights."
author: Meredith Duran

quote: Risk is the factor of a stratagem measured by what man is powerless to control.
author: Mike  Norton

quote: Did if feel like jumping off a cliff when he kissed you? I imagine it did.
author: Suzanne Hayes

quote: Never go into venture capital if you want a peaceful life.
author: Georges F. Doriot

quote: Because what’s life
author: Dennis Sharpe

quote: Procrastination exposes goals or dreams to risk.
author: Bernard Osei Annang

quote: The unknown is your biggest fear, and your greatest gift.
author: Joshua Lynott

quote: Staying within the edge will not get you to cutting-edge. Risk a little to achieve. - Kailin Gow. Strong
author: Kailin Gow

quote: Blindly depend on others, is an initial risk of automatical one's failure.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: All life is a gamble and our lives are the dice we throw,
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Early scientists were often ridiculed for their theories. Be open to replacing outdated belief systems with new ones.
author: Jennifer Ritchie Payette

quote: Do not put your life at risk, for someone who does not care about you.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: Discomfort may be a doorway; don’t run from it.
author: Joseph Deitch

quote: Great danger is always associated with great power. The difference between the great and the mediocre is that the great are willing to take the risk.
author: R.F. Kuang

quote: That's the thing about risks, it's impossible to know which ones are worth it until it's too late.
author: Alexandra Christo

quote: Resolution: Just don’t be so afraid.
author: Huntley Fitzpatrick

quote: Freedom is always associated with risk taking, whether it leads to it or comes from it.
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quote: If folk think they know what you are up to, they don't dig much deeper and risk finding the truth.
author: Alwyn Hamilton

quote: Run With Me: You're evolving into a different and better you. You believe more in yourself so you're more ready for risk.
author: Helen S. Rosenau

quote: If the dream is not bigger than me, I have mistaken an idea for a dream.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Whenever you create anything, you take a risk. And that includes your life. It may work out, it may not. It may be well received, it may not be. . . .
author: Rob Bell

quote: Was he scared? Hell, yeah. But sometimes the only way to change something was to break it first.
author: Joelle Charbonneau

quote: If ever they could resume, even just for an afternoon. If ever she called. A sin was not a sin, if it were for her. A risk was not a risk.
author: Fatima Farheen Mirza

quote: there is no such thing as a riskless strategy Strategy will always involve both opportunity and risk,
author: W. Chan Kim

quote: Effective blue ocean strategy should be about risk minimization and not risk taking
author: W. Chan Kim

quote: Well.’ Maud handed me a bandage. 'That was the most foolish thing you’ve ever done.’
author: Linsey Miller

quote: You don’t have to act strong when you are strong.
author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

quote: If you never lose sight of the shore, you’re not on a voyage of discovery. You’re on a day cruise.
author: J. Earp

quote: Taking risk is bravery, but inviting any risk is a ridicule adventure.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: The box that I’ve built around me is equal to the fear that is within me.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: If we are unwilling to crash, we can never soar.
author: Carmine Savastano

quote: Do not take the risk to create barriers making difficulties in your way of the dream and bright future.
author: Ehsan Sehgal

quote: There are some games you don't get to play unless you are all in.
author: Jordan B. Peterson

quote: When you give everything
author: Kate McGahan

quote: Hastra handed him a blanket. "Shouldn't you take off her knives?"
author: V.E. Schwab

quote: Romanticism requires bravery and risk.
author: Terese Marie Mailhot

quote: I don’t think I deserve him.
author: Shaun David Hutchinson

quote: Fight your fear, your laziness, your ignorance before you worry about fighting the competition.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: To love is to risk.  To not love is also to risk.  Yet when it comes to love, the greatest risk is incurred when we give risk that much power.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: One runs the risk, whenever one opens one eyes, of not liking what one sees.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: No matter what life throws at you, don't become jaded or cynical. Love is worth the risk.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: People who are not enjoying themselves very much always most dislike risking their lives.
author: William Bolitho

quote: One runs the risk, whenever one opens ones eyes, of not liking what one sees.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: YOU HAVE TO BE WILLING TO RISK A LOSS TO WIN IT ALL!! - (G SWISS)
author: G Swiss

quote: No technology is strictly helpful or harmful. Digital inventiveness’ result stands mainly on human risk consciousness and security consistency.
author: Stephane Nappo

quote: Caught up in the tenderness of the touch,Joey couldn't answer. Everything, he realized. He'd risk everything for Liam.
author: A.E. Wasp

quote: You have to be a risk taker to innovate.
author: Haresh Sippy

quote: Cast yourself upon the waters. Trust in your ability to swim.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Step out the door and see what you can find.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: The corporate controlled government is the biggest risk to national security.
author: Steven Magee

quote: If I am risk adverse, my growth will be reversed.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Do not risk your life for someone who does not care about you.
author: Gift Gugu Mona

quote: It’s curtain call for the crew of inner voices that have been running their own rowdy performance all these years.
author: Amy  McTear

quote: It was always wise to pick your battles and this was one they could not win. Not, yet, anyway.
author: Jason Medina

quote: The goal is to hit the sweet spot of maximum value optimization, where foolish risk is balanced against excessive caution.
author: Steven J. Bowen

quote: I’d rather be in trouble a safe distance away, than to die here for something stupid.
author: Jason Medina

quote: Without risk, life is far too predictable
author: Renee Ahdieh

quote: Risk is the clue that our dreams are both real and great.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: You have already lost if you are always fearful of losing everything.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: No act of knowledge acquisition is entirely without risk.
author: Alastair Reynolds

quote: Playing it safe might not have hurt anyone, but it wouldn’t have inspired many, either.
author: Alex Staniforth

quote: Love must risk all or perish.
author: Anthony  Ryan

quote: People who swim very well in troubled waters are respected and celebrated than those who swim excellently in calm waters.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Blind risk is stupid, but calculated risks are worth taking.
author: Adam Burch

quote: Every risk that you take in order for you to come into significance is the greatest kind of risk to take.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Security means the state of being free from danger or threat.
author: Angelica Hopes

quote: We experience [procrastination] as fear. But fear of what?
author: Steven Pressfield

quote: Fear is not the end. But only a transition.
author: Dragos Bratasanu, Ph.D.

quote: I don’t want safety or guarantees—
author: Justin Wetch

quote: I would rather listen to someone who tried and failed than someone who dreamed but never tried.
author: Jennifer Coletta

quote: The more risk you can take upfront in life, the better off you will be later.
author: Tarun Sharma

quote: To love anyone is to risk.
author: Stephanie Morrill

quote: Just follow your bliss, that's all you have to do. Be willing to be disappointed, for if you risk nothing, you'll have nothing worth having.
author: Kate McGahan

quote: Don't follow the crowd. The side of the majority is the riskiest place to have dust thrown on your uniqueness.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: It’s not about inviting great things into our lives. Rather, it’s about accepting the invitation of great things to step out of our lives.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: We live in a blatantly corrupt world and smart people engage in the wise practice of risk management.
author: Steven Magee

quote: Change makers take risks and are ready to die for excellence than to give excuses and live for mediocrity.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Your best authorial self is always one about to ruin the story.
author: Chuck Wendig

quote: Every expression of desired friendship has potential bite. Every smile reveals the teeth.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: The ‘gods’ that do us the greatest harm are the gods we deny having.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: To become a better you, dare to take calculated risks and overcome your limitations. Your scars can make you a star, but you have to decide.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Genuinely intelligence-led operations have to be embedded into both processes and more importantly mindsets to bridge the gaps in Risk Management.
author: Pearl Zhu

quote: If you are not ready to take a risk ten you are not ready for success
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you are trying to look clean, neat and avoid casting your nets in trouble waters, you will catch no fish.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: To become a better you, hurry up and take risks.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Risks may make you win, or they will make you learn. Either of the benefits is worth daring for.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: On Money - There are many ways to get rich quickly. All of them are risky. Some of them are dangerous. A few of them are downright fatal.
author: Marsha Hinds

quote: A man who is not ready to risk is not worthy of getting promotion
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love risk when making money. Hate risk when investing money.
author: Robert Rolih

quote: The world will never know you because you were not bold and did not take a risk
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Growth requires courage, risk and the willingness to go beyond fear.
author: Catherine Louise Birmingham

quote: desperate times required judicious risk-taking.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: Head injuries are a significant risk to accelerated cognitive decline.
author: Steven Magee

quote: Take risks. Whoever risk, shall know how far they can reach.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Sometimes to change a situation you are in requires you to take a giant leap. But, you won't be able to fly unless you are willing to transform.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Ô, the wine of a woman
author: Roman Payne

quote: He sighed and grabbed my left arm, examining the tattoo. “What were you thinking? Didn’t you know I’d come as soon as I could?
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: You never discover the unexpected if you always stick with the familiar
author: Jeff Dixon-Terror in the Kingdom

quote: Work hard and take risks. Try it before you confirm it is difficult!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: The more we construct lives that prioritize safety, the bigger the prison we construct around ourselves.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: The price of success is the risk of self-esteem.
author: Jim Ruta

quote: There are two types of risk in life: the danger of trying and the danger of not trying.
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: The only way to live is to risk being unhappy...and I'd rather be unhappy with the person I loved than as contented as a cat by the fire.
author: Harry Haskell

quote: This is the world in which everyone is sensitised to risk but indifferent to fate.
author: David Runciman

quote: Risk all to find the right path.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Take the risk! You find the right road!
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Take the risk! You will find the right road.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If we take a risk, we might not succeed, but if we avoid all risk, we guarantee we won't succeed, and we miss so much of what God wants us to learn.
author: Craig Groeschel

quote: A surprise visit? That's so romantic...but fairly risky."
author: Nina George

quote: It's always a risk. Wherever there is great emotion. because there is power in that. And few people handle power well.
author: Morgan Matson

quote: Risk is part of the game.
author: Victoria Aveyard

quote: Successful innovators are..not risk-focused; they are opportunity focused.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Successful business people became successful because they took risks. The biggest risk is that once successful, they stop taking risks.
author: G.R. Gopinath

quote: You are Entering the Red Zone.
author: Justin Cronin

quote: Whosoever insists on winning must play at trivial games; no interesting victory is ever assured.
author: Donald Kingsbury

quote: Be careful when rising to the top. Be more careful when you get there. The higher you go, the riskier it gets. Be careful. Be very careful.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Your courage to take a risk and your ability to accept responsibility will define you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Just because something is ubiquitous does not mean that it is innocuous.
author: Clifford Cohen

quote: Great risks could be undertaken only after great preparation.
author: Robert Ferrigno

quote: People regret not achieving enough success in life, they should regret missing many opportunities in life.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: You can't stop Greatness; you can only try to delay it. And when you try to delay it, it just gets Greater because it gains new strength.
author: Tiffany Winfree

quote: We can make detours with our mind but we can't distract the truth from our heart.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: We avoid risks in life only to die, and end up facing the greatest risk which is having lived life risking nothing at all.
author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

quote: Do you ride?” That sounded sort of dirty, and the way he looked at me felt sort of dirty, too. No one ever looked at me like that.
author: Jenn Bennett

quote: The Hot Air Balloon Charm
author: Viola Shipman

quote: There was a danger in asking too much of a child, but the danger of asking too little was almost equal.
author: Robin Hobb

quote: It was too late for he and his father to have an adventure, and NOTHING seemed to have any color anymore.
author: Robert Kurson

quote: The real destination lies in step taking!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Behind all the surface composure, there seemed to be a great darkness: an urge to test himself, to take risks, to haunt the edges of things.
author: Paul Auster

quote: Sung Win smiled to himself, enjoying the tension across his shoulders and the way his pulse beat in his veins. All life involved risk.
author: Conn Iggulden

quote: It seems that now is the time to take risks and strike.
author: Roger Parkinson

quote: You must choose to risk what you fear to lose to gain everything you desire
author: Catrice M. Jackson

quote: Sure, safety is, well, safe, but will it help me achieve the things I really want for my life?
author: Kayt Sukel

quote: There is no fun or glory living a dull life. You have take chance and tackle challenges to make it interesting.
author: Evan  Smith

quote: People wishes their friends to be in politics, but their sons in professions.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Sometimes in life, you have to take difficult steps and tough decisions, in order to achieve something bigger.
author: Saad Salman

quote: Words fail to describe
author: Anjum Choudhary

quote: Love left us long back,
author: Anjum Choudhary

quote: Some of us cover to protect our bodies
author: Anjum Choudhary

quote: You're torn between wanting to be closer and wanting to push me away," he said. "So I vote for closer. I'll always vote for closer.
author: Martina Boone

quote: Opening to love will always involve risk,but a heart safe from pain is one also locked to joy.
author: John Mark Green

quote: Clarity repositions you to quit nice activities that take you nowhere in order to pursue risky tasks that take you somewhere.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Leaders do what is uncomfortable but helpful. They run away from the comfort that doesn't produce any help for the world.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: There’s risk inherent in most things that matter.
author: Alexis  Hall

quote: The desire to swim in deeper waters is what gives a greater experience. Nothing new comes out of being ordinary. Leaders take risks.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: You have to risk falling to be able to fly.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything worth anything is worth risk.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: When Derek hesitated, Chloe said,
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: Why try to fit yourself into that same, tired mold when you could become something better?"
author: Allyson Jeleyne

quote: We only regret the chances we didn't take
author: Robin Dabhi

quote: do not just take a risk ; take the risk. When you are taking the risk, ponder!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The long term health effects from utility company smart meters present a far greater risk to the general population than terrorism in the USA.
author: Steven Magee

quote: J.P. Morgan learned to fish in troubled waters.
author: H.W. Brands

quote: No matter how big the risk will be, you're willing to do anything, to get what you want or save yourself.
author: Ebelsain Villegas

quote: Leaders are interested in gains. However, they acknowledge that there is no gain without pain. They embrace the pain.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Every great leader once fell down from a tall ladder. You don't become a star until you get the scar. Take that risk now.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: If one Godfather offers you an opportunity and another Godfather offers you an advantage, go with the former.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: I have loved this world in ways
author: Anjum Choudhary

quote: Don't focus on the words i write,
author: Anjum Choudhary

quote: Those who don’t want to take risks in life end up been the losers.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Responsibility for the consequences of actions is not the price of freedom, but one of its rewards.
author: Charles Murray

quote: Many have said, “Follow my steps” I say to you, create your own paths, and follow no one, live, risk it all, die and be free.
author: Quetzal

quote: Not all weapons are guns or blades; the most dangerous are subtle, hidden.
author: Andrea Cremer

quote: We stand the risk of failure, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We stand the risk of stagnation, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There are one hundred men seeking security to one able man who is willing to risk his fortune.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: The greatest risk in life is not to take a risk.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: But despite the fact that life is full of risk, yet without taking risk, we stand a greater risk.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Careful had never really been her style.
author: Tiffany Quay Tyson

quote: Photobomb me at your own risk!
author: Ken Poirot

quote: No low-trust society will ever produce sustained innovation.
author: Thomas L. Friedman

quote: We stand the risk of backwardness, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We stand the risk of regression, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Have the courage to stand out and take few risks!
author: Anuranjita Kumar

quote: We stand the risk of a standstill, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You stand the risk of a down turn, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You stand the risk of bankruptcy, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Opportunity and risk come in pairs
author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quote: You stand the risk of misfortunes, because you refused to take risks. So life demands risks.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: He was her reason for existence,
author: Findinglostsouls

quote: She had known the kind of love that was worth risking everything for, the kind of love that was as rare as a glimpse of heaven.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Anyone who takes the risk of leaving God for a while, risks his life in eternity.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Risk: no full life occurs without it.
author: Gina Greenlee

quote: Everyday take one optimistic calculated risk to find out how far you can go.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To esteem what makes you holy over what makes you happy - that is the greatest dare.
author: Criss Jami

quote: If you can endure anything, you can become anything.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Adventure, opportunity and reward extend beyond our field of vision, and are made known to us only when we test our wings.
author: Gina Greenlee

quote: When someone is walking beside us, we have more courage to walk into the unknown and to risk the dark and messy places in our journey.
author: Henry Kimsey-House

quote: When someone is walking beside us, we have more courage to walk into the unknown and to risk the dark and messy places in our journey.
author: Karen Kimsey-House

quote: The risk of all friendship is, alas, a little grief.
author: Alison Croggon

quote: If we aren't willing to do whatever is required," he said finally, "then we risk losing what we have been mandated to protect.
author: James Luceno

quote: There is a difference between ‘off-limits’ and those places you can visit without getting caught.
author: Fennel Hudson

quote: The fullness of life is in the hazards of life.
author: Edith Hamilton

quote: You can go from seeking to seeker when you stop bouncing. Set a plan for change and take the risks you need to take without worrying about failing.
author: Andrea Goeglein

quote: Give yourself permission to Risk. It is only in risk that one finds success.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: Taking risks is part of life, but to take risks invites the possibility of disapointmet, but also the possiblity of true happiness
author: Morten Høgsberg

quote: Take a chance and risk it all or play it safe and suffer defeat.
author: Pittacus Lore

quote: Sometimes you just have to know when the battle you’re fighting is one best walked away from, than fought to the cold, bitter end.
author: A.J. Darkholme

quote: The field of asking is fundamentally improvisational. It thrives not in the creation of rules and etiquette but in the smashing of that etiquette.
author: Amanda Palmer

quote: To take risk and fail is not a failure. Real failure is to fear taking any risk
author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quote: Sometimes it is worth taking a risk, no matter what the consequences.
author: emily arden

quote: Magic?" What did magic have to do with breaking into someone's store and stealing their stuff?
author: Brom

quote: Gamblers take blind risks. Entrepreneurs take risks while visually impaired and feel their way up and out.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: When nothing is at stake, everything's a waste.
author: Crystal Woods

quote: Sometimes, the risks we take are so extreme that if things didn’t work in our favor, we could lose EVERYTHING for the sake of our faith.
author: D Nicole Williams

quote: I had risked everything and gained everything, and here I was of the world and in it.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: Sometimes it's best to trade an ideal for something more practical that you can guarantee.
author: A.J. Darkholme

quote: Sometimes you have to risk life, in order to live, and gamble death, to sacrifice life.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Ours was such a delicious risk.
author: Scott Hastie

quote: If you like tiger cubs,you got to get into the den!
author: Abha Maryada Banerjee

quote: Your choices are very essential; without a better choice, you are risking to drive a destination whose name you know, but address you forget!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: You can't be a rebel without the scars that come with it. Truth is, some days scars are just as ugly as they are beautiful.
author: Criss Jami

quote: If you can't ignore imperfections, then your imaginary ideal soulmate will always remain pending till you grow old and die.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Dreams and freedom are the same. In order for them to be, they come with a price.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Emperors are not made from cowards; they are made from those who take great risk where there stands to be even greater gain.
author: A.J. Darkholme

quote: Wanna become a Billionaire...?
author: Nitin Yadav

quote: Reputation is an outcome; but it is also a valuable, strategic asset.
author: Andrew Griffin

quote: For individuals and organizations alike, a reputation is far easier to destroy than it is to build.
author: Andrew Griffin

quote: 1125Wanna become a Billionaire...?
author: Nitin Yadav

quote: Boundaries and risk management are very important parts of living a healthy and positive life.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: China is a political beast, with the Party at its heart, and the importance of political and regulatory due diligence cannot be overstated.
author: Jeremy  Gordon

quote: Don't be afraid to start small, entrepreneurship takes courage to win, and look for quick wins while setting a short and long term vision
author: Desmond Oshifeso

quote: Grow or Die - Don’t let your fear of uncertainty keep you from achieving your dreams, it is far riskier to stagnate.
author: Malti Bhojwani

quote: Life without risk is a life that is benign and sterile.
author: Alex T Wilson

quote: Every  person’s  life  should  include  one  reckless  moment.
author: Julie McSorley Marcus McSorley

quote: Risk is uncertainty injected into our most vulnerable places. And because that’s the case, we may choose not to risk.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: If I die on my way to the dance, it will be better than to survive having never lifted my feet.
author: Agnostic Zetetic

quote: The newly-minted captain is told to let nothing stop him but to do nothing that would risk his ship or his crew.
author: Patrick O'Brian

quote: Absolutely, love matters,” she reiterated. “We forget that at our own risk.
author: Paul Russell

quote: Reagan's failure to become a truly great movie star has been ascribed to project menace, sexuality, or even moral ambiguity.
author: Scott Farris

quote: Risk is the stuff that sucks the predictability right out of the very things that we desperately wish were predictable.
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: Never give up your right to be wrong, and be sure to give others that right too.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: I lived a life, a life of risks, risks I never took.
author: Aleksandar Marinkov

quote: It's an obvious challenge, but the risk feels too big, the leap too grand, the future too unknown
author: A. Rosa

quote: What I do know is that there are two kinds of pain in this life: risk and regret. I'd rather live with the first than the second.
author: Holley Gerth

quote: Confidence comes from crossing thresholds.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: When you fear falling, you never get off the ground.
author: Addison Killebrew

quote: Sometimes, Reynie, trouble itself is the key. - Mr. Benedict
author: Trenton Lee Stewart

quote: You know you have received the invitation when your heart is ready to risk everything to hold the hand of God.
author: Holly Lynn Payne

quote: Risk should be taken for a cause not pleasure, life is not worth to ruin but to live with pride.
author: Zeeshan Ahmed

quote: Teamwork is great for all, but result is greater for some.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Creating anything that never existed before is not sanity.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: Once I get something going well, I'll risk fucking it up just for the action.
author: Ice-T

quote: Risk may bring pain, but risk also brings freedom and reward.
author: Shandel Slaten

quote: Entrepreneurs often underestimate costs and overestimate rewards. But the fact that they estimate & still take action sets them apart from peers.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Failures or successes are not as important as the willingness to risk.
author: Darryl Webb

quote: Risk may bring pain, but risk also brings freedom and reward.
author: Shandel Slaten - Clarity Focusing On What Matters

quote: Toklo raked his companions with a hard glance. “Don’t risk your own safety.
author: Erin Hunter

quote: You have put yourself at risk to activate your instinctual genius.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Doubt is an acceptable risk for happiness.
author: David Levithan

quote: The more we love, the more it hurts, and the more we have to let go.
author: Mary E. DeMuth

quote: Everything in life has some risk, and what you have to actually learn to do is how to navigate it.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: We must all get our hearts broken sometimes. This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: Don't risk your life for those that doesn't love your life, lest you end up in regrets if not death.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: There's no safety in love. You risk the whole of life. But the great thing is to risk -to believe, and to risk everything for your belief.
author: Elizabeth von Arnim

quote: Jesus often calls us to risk. He asks us to be vulnerable, to be authentic, so others can see Him in and through us.
author: Mary E. DeMuth

quote: Love has no demand of us but to keep practicing, to do the next hard thing. Love says, Come dear. Take the next step.
author: Anna White

quote: Once you find your dream, risk everything to make it come true.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: I really am the world's shittiest boyfriend. Holding onto something
author: Kelley York

quote: Anyway,You need to focus only on you.
author: pavankumar nagaraj

quote: Rise or Fall you must not stop doing.
author: pavankumar nagaraj

quote: Who says there's just one safe way to walk, one road properly lit, and the rest - all slippery water, unmarked?
author: Betsy Sholl

quote: For God's sake, Gwen," he said gently. "What matter that I love you. That's not the bit that's always been missing."
author: Meredith Duran

quote: What looked safe was not safe. What looked hard and unsafe was probably safer. Anyway, safe was somewhere else in the world.
author: David Halberstam

quote: Derivatives - The risk never leaves the system - It finds taker who believes the risk is acceptable....until they lose everything.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Acts of love, for me, are leaps of bravery.
author: Anna White

quote: Today we must begin again. Step by small step, without any more protection than comes from our own bodies.
author: Eduardo Galeano

quote: Maybe winning isn’t everything. One just needs to hedge the bet and minimize the risk.
author: Doug   Cooper

quote: Freedom, inefficiency, and prosperity are not in it frequently found together, and it is seldom easy to distinguish between the first two.
author: Edmund S Morgan

quote: Risk is what you control and fortune is really all about risk. Bottom Line: Fortune comes from big money bets on very low probability events
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: It is irritating when someone talking to me,When she is not talking
author: pavankumar nagaraj

quote: I believe the more personally removed people are from a major financial event, the less it is to affect their appetite for risk.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: Love always requires courage and involves risk.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: We can't be in survival mode. We have to be in growth mode.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: There's no reward without work, no victory without effort, no battle won without risk.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Most men wait to move until victory is guaranteed.
author: John Eldredge

quote: I can never gain something without losing everything I had before.
author: Nadia Scrieva

quote: Yellow decided to risk for a butterfly.
author: Trina Paulus

quote: You are only given one life, one chance at fully living it...take risks, believe in your dreams, explore the world and her people, live out loud!
author: Danell Lynn

quote: The death knell for any enterprise is to glorify the past -- no matter how good it was.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The greatest risk is not taking any.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: Most God-ordained dreams die because we are not willing to do something that seems illogical
author: Mark Batterson

quote: The game isn't big enough unless it scares you a little. Cmdr. William Riker
author: Star Trek: The Next Generation Episode Guide Team

quote: Emotion has its place, but it must not interfere with taking the appropriate action.
author: Susan Oakey-Baker

quote: The greatest risk is not taking one.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: The genealogy of blessing always traces back to God-ordained risk.
author: Mark Batterson

quote: A Relationship Should Come With An ENTER AT YOUR OWN RISK Sign.
author: Cyc Jouzy

quote: Didn't anyone ever teach you that it's easier to ask forgiveness than permission?
author: Emily Horner

quote: Mountaineers are one of the few groups to celebrate before the finish line. More mountaineers die on the descent than on the ascent.
author: Susan Oakey-Baker

quote: Jim turned his head slowly to look into my eyes and shuddered. “It’s the closest I’ve ever felt to dying.
author: Susan Oakey-Baker

quote: We would do our theology better if more was at stake in what we said.
author: John Piper

quote: Without risk in our lives, we’re scarcely better than machines ourselves.
author: Alastair Reynolds

quote: Ryan-chasers have a life wish. They live life to the fullest because they are willing to look foolish.
author: Mark Batterson

quote: We see the world as less random than it actually is.
author: Nassim Taleb

quote: If you take risks, you may fail. But if you do not take risks, you will surely fail. The greatest risk of all is to do nothing.
author: Roberto Goizueta

quote: Love is the bee that carries the pollen from one heart to another.
author: Slash Coleman

quote: Why does everyone think a guy who prefers love to people is missing something in his life?
author: Slash Coleman

quote: Anything in your life that’s acting as a security blanket is only smothering the person you were born to be.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: I am part of everyone I ever dated on OK Cupid.
author: Slash Coleman

quote: Well, that is what you risk when you fall in love. You risk losing your dignity.
author: J.M. Coetzee

quote: There is no greater place for damage (than marriage) because there is no greater place for glory.
author: John Eldredge

quote: They’d come for you, and this time they’d come with weapons.
author: Julio-Alexi Genao

quote: Some have won a wild delight,
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: The willingness to be a champion for stupid ideas is the key to greater creativity, innovation, fulfillment, inspiration, motivation and success.
author: Richie Norton

quote: What is courage without risk... It wouldn’t really be courage, would it?
author: Jocelyn  Murray

quote: Behind every no entry sign there's a door.
author: Peter Jones

quote: Life Insurance is a mitigation to the risk of your life
author: Manoj Arora

quote: A historian is a risk-terrified prophet.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Risky is not the same as crazy. Failing is not the same as being worthless.
author: Alyson Hagy

quote: Why would we need to experience the Comforter if our lives are already comfortable?
author: Francis Chan

quote: Just remember, you never know what's possible until you risk finding out.
author: Jasinda Wilder

quote: Caution is the path to mediocrity. Gliding, passionless mediocrity is all that most people think they can achieve.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Your mother is risking a lot, because she believes in you.
author: Matthew Quick

quote: Take a wrong turn. Get lost in something you love.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Oh I know it's cliché but yeah they say that great men make it in-
author: Criss Jami

quote: The riskiest thing we can do is just maintain the status quo.
author: Bob Iger

quote: It is impossible to be truly artistic without the risk of offending someone somewhere.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: Everyone was willing to take some small risk to lessen the damage of their ambition and disorder and lawlessness.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: Engaging in activities devoid of difficulty, lounging in risk-free zones, is life without great meaning.
author: Jon M. Huntsman Sr.

quote: ...I don't want security - to be self-assured - I want to risk my heart in making your portrait and be paid the wages of your devotion...
author: John Geddes

quote: If every day at work feels like a Friday, then you are doing what you were meant to do.
author: Alan W. Kennedy

quote: Some adventures should never be repeated.
author: Mike L. Hopper

quote: Do you still insist on telling the truth even though you know that it could destroy this world?
author: Toba Beta

quote: A risk is a risk because it's avoidable.
author: Erica Bauermeister

quote: ...the ratings agencies' problem was in being unable or uninterested in appreciating the distinction between risk and uncertainty.
author: Nate Silver

quote: The willingness to show up changes us, It makes us a little braver each time.
author: Brené Brown

quote: Stand at the top of a cliff and jump off and build your wings on the way down.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: There's never any great risk as long as you have money.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: Have nuts and be nuts.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The ragamuffin gospel says we can't lose, because we have nothing to lose.
author: Brennan Manning

quote: I might be manipulating you to create risk for myself.
author: Sharon Stone

quote: When there's nothing left to save, there's nothing left to lose.
author: T.S. Welti

quote: Any way, is better than no way at all.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Leaders know that the fruit of life is out on a limb.
author: Orrin Woodward
